svelte-4-5-runes.title: Svelte 4/5/Runes
svelte-4-5-runes.description: Verions 1 is for Svelte 4/5 and version 2 is for Svelte 5 Runes.

accessible.title: Accessible SVGs
accessible.description: A11y props, `title`, `desc`, and `ariaLabel` for accessible SVG icons.

faster-compiling.title: Faster Compiling
faster-compiling.description: Import icons directly to optimize compilation speed and improve performance.

ide-support.title: IDE Support
ide-support.description: Hovering over a component name will display features, props, events, and more for an LSP-compatible editors.

global-icons.title: Global Icons
global-icons.description: Use `IconSolid` and `IconOutline` to careat default icons.

css-frameworks.title: CSS Frameworks support
css-frameworks.description: Use TailwindCSS, Bootstrap CSS, or any other CSS frameworks.

seven-props.title: Seven Props
seven-props.description: Control the size, role, color, events, aria-label, title, and desc.

darkmode.title: Dark mode
darkmode.description: Use `class` props to add your dark mode color.
